thread.title: BRIEF-US VR Global.Com Says To Offer, Sell Up To 21.2 Mln Shares Of Common Stock Of Co By Selling Stockholders

title: BRIEF-US VR Global.Com Says To Offer, Sell Up To 21.2 Mln Shares Of Common Stock Of Co By Selling Stockholders

organizations.name: common stock of co by selling stockholders reuters

text:
Market News April 19, 2018 / 5:42 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago BRIEF-US VR Global.Com Says To Offer, Sell Up To 21.2 Mln Shares Of Common Stock Of Co By Selling Stockholders Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - US VR Global.Com Inc: 
* US VR GLOBAL.COM - TO OFFER, SELL UP TO 21.2 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK OF CO BY SELLING STOCKHOLDERS Source text ( bit.ly/2qJnBJu ) Further company coverage:
